banner.description: Specialized service for companies and complete solutions for banking and consumer needs.

aria.background_alt: Main page background banner with abstract graphic elements

services.section_description: Our team of professionals works in different areas to protect your rights or your company's interests.

main.title: Civil Law
main.description: We resolve conflicts, indemnities, and everyday issues for your legal security.

main.title: Criminal Law
main.description: Specialized defense in criminal proceedings, ensuring protection at all stages.

main.title: Contracts
main.description: Drafting and reviewing contracts to ensure legal security and protection.

main.title: Consulting
main.description: Strategic legal guidance to prevent risks and ensure legal compliance.

secondary.title: Consumer Law
secondary.description: We defend consumer rights in various situations, such as online purchases, undue charges, and product or service defects.

secondary.title: Banking Law
secondary.description: We provide legal advice on issues involving banks, financial contracts, abusive charges, and debt renegotiation. Protect your rights with our support.

secondary.title: Labor Law
secondary.description: We act in the defense of workers and companies in labor disputes, contract terminations, social security rights, and other work-related issues.

enterprise.description: We are a company specialized in personalized legal advice and consulting for small and medium-sized businesses, offering drafting of documents, legal opinions, complete reports, and comprehensive support in labor matters. For the general public, we work on banking demands, such as repossession processes, account blocks, and other areas of Consumer Law. We have a team of over 60 employees and legal assistants prepared to deliver the best service to companies and individuals.

ceo.description: A lawyer specializing in banking and consumer law, he graduated in law from Anhanguera University in 2018. With extensive experience in managing processes, people and business recovery, he has led a team of more than 60 employees, including lawyers and legal assistants, since 2023, when he took over the management of Mediari and led the company to exponential and upward growth. After working for years in commercial management and corporate crises, he currently dedicates his career to assisting companies and consumers seeking legal protection for situations of injustice that damage their most basic rights in our society.
ceo.quote: "Justice is not a privilege, it is a right - and our mission is to ensure that it is accessible to all."

team.description: With over 60 employees and legal assistants, we deliver excellence in all services.

contact.description: Contact us through our networks and have your rights protected.

error.title: Page Not Found
error.not_found: Oops! The page you are looking for was not found.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

seo.title: Law for Companies and Individuals
seo.description: Legal consulting for small and medium businesses and individuals. Specialists in Labor, Banking, and Consumer Law.

socialAction.section_description: We believe in the transformative power of law and dedicate ourselves to projects that promote social justice and positive impact in the community.

abrigo_irma_tereza.name: Sister Tereza Shelter
abrigo_irma_tereza.description: Donation of hygiene products, geriatric diapers, and groceries to support elderly residents at the shelter.

instituto_tuh.name: TUH Institute
instituto_tuh.description: Donation of basic food baskets to vulnerable families, ensuring food security.

tragedia_rio_grande_sul.name: Rio Grande do Sul Tragedy
tragedia_rio_grande_sul.description: Donation of clothing, footwear, and groceries to victims of the climate tragedy in RS.

casa_florescer.name: Casa Florescer (LGBTQIA+)
casa_florescer.description: Donation of bedding and hygiene kits to support the vulnerable LGBTQIA+ community.

nucleo_menino_jesus.name: Baby Jesus Center
nucleo_menino_jesus.description: Donation of groceries (milk, cookies, and bread) for children in vulnerable situations.

instituto_losurdo.name: Losurdo Institute
instituto_losurdo.description: Donation of basic food baskets to needy families, promoting dignity and food security.

instituto_borboleta_azul.name: Blue Butterfly Institute
instituto_borboleta_azul.description: Donation of painting, drawing materials, and interactive games for educational development.

projeto_social_abencoe.name: Abençoe Social Project
projeto_social_abencoe.description: Donation of groceries, hygiene products, and toys for underprivileged children in the countryside.

careers.section_description: Join our team of qualified professionals and be part of a company committed to legal excellence.
